name: Sonic.exe The Last Chase - Official Game
name_original: Sonic.exe The Last Chase - Official Game
description:
Sonic.exe The Last chase is a platformer,horror and 2d game inspired by the popular sonic.exe fangames system using Not So Simple sonic worlds engine, This game is a rewrite to the stroy of the game "Sonic.exe The Bad Time Collection"  which i made and you still can play it here:  https://sites.google.com/view/sonicexethebadtimecollection/accueil , this game is a small demo showing how the story begins, and it's short (between 5-10 minutes only), but I promise that the full version is going to have a lot of things added in.

One of the days, sonic was on the green hill zone trying to stop eggman plans till an entity camed to control his body and made him kill his friends, and their goal is to survive him and try to reach the mastered emerald, and make him turn back into normal character but it won't be easy, because the entity is a lot stronger than any different entity, which will make this mission hard.

Made by: THGS Team - The Horror Games Source

  • Owner, Director, Designer, Coder, Translator: Evil Tubby Does Gaming
  • Level Designers: Just A normal cat playing games, Hecker, Evil Tubby Does Gaming
  • Artists:  It'sTem, The Stupidity Expert
  • Beta Testers:  TheDonKing, Evil Tubby Does Gaming, It'sTem, The Stupidity Expert, Just A normal cat playing games
  • Spriters:  TheDonKing, Evil Tubby Does Gaming

Made using: Clickteam Fusion Develepor 2.5+  - Not So Simple Sonic Worlds (Owner Edition)

Songs Used:

  • Slendytubbies III (Mutation, A new order) - By Zeoworks
  • Shadow The Hedgehog (Sad Ending) - By SEGA
  • The Henry Stickmin Collection (Breaking The Bank Theme) - By PuffBallsUnited

All characters used in this game belongs to: SEGA
